Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery grooved vessel, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown deposit, the exterior is covered with a brown slip and faint traces of two lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393286) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393286)
